body_html: If the k top-k lists are sorted, they will remain sorted if we add the cumulative score of the input hypotheses they were generated from. The finding the global top-k takes O(k log k) in the worst case with k space (see algorithm http://stackoverflow.com/a/21051271).
body_text: If the k top-k lists are sorted, they will remain sorted if we add the cumulative score of the input hypotheses they were generated from.  The finding the global top-k takes O(k log k) in the worst case with k space (see algorithm  http://stackoverflow.com/a/21051271).
body: If the k top-k lists are sorted, they will remain sorted if we add the cumulative score of the input hypotheses they were generated from.  The finding the global top-k takes O(k log k) in the worst case with k space (see algorithm  http://stackoverflow.com/a/21051271).
